author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO FORECAST TO RAPIDLY STRENGTHEN INTO A HURRICANE BY TUESDAY...
summary: ...KIKO FORECAST TO RAPIDLY STRENGTHEN INTO A HURRICANE BY TUESDAY... As of 5:00 AM HST Mon Sep 01 the center of Kiko was located near 14.0, -126.3 with movement W at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO FORECAST TO RAPIDLY STRENGTHEN INTO A HURRICANE BY TUESDAY... As of 5:00 AM HST Mon Sep 01 the center of Kiko was located near 14.0, -126.3 with movement W at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
